net.antidot.api.search
Interface TextFormatter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicTextFormatter
public interface TextFormatter

Interface to format output text at your convenience.

Implement this interface to format title and abstract for AFS search engine reply.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String match(java.lang.String input)
          Formats text matching the query.
 java.lang.String text(java.lang.String input)
          Formats non-matching text.
 java.lang.String trunc()
          Format truncated text.
 

Method Detail

text

java.lang.String text(java.lang.String input)
Formats non-matching text.

Input text is usually returned as is without any modification.

Parameters:
input - [in] one or more words considered as non-matching text.
Returns:
input formatted as required.

match

java.lang.String match(java.lang.String input)
Formats text matching the query.

You probably want to embrace the input with <b> and </b> tags or something more advanced depending on your integration.

Parameters:
input - [in] text matching the query.
Returns:
input formatted appropriately.

trunc

java.lang.String trunc()
Format truncated text.

When title or abstract is too long, it is truncated. This method allows to specify which text will represent this truncation.
... characters are usually used in such case.

Returns:
truncated text representation.
